name: First Vault
tagline: A user friendly view to pathfinder equipment.
body:
### Welcome to First Vault
This is currently a work in progress.

####Goal
If you are familiar with Dungeons and Dragons or Pathfinder, you have probably spent time looking over various tables trying to find the right equipment for your characters. Many online resources exist, such as [d20pfsrd](http://d20.pfsrd.com), but the information they present is mostly static. First Vault aims to be a comprehensive and interactive resource that makes it easy to find the items you want.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
